title: buying runes error
body: So i have an account wich only has tier 2 runes and now that tier 3's are discounted to 10 ip i want to buy those but i cant.. i can buy some of them but i cant buy the ones i already own in tier2 form.. for instance i own 9 of the tier2 magic pen runes and i cant buy tier 3 magic pen runes. I always get some kinda of unknown error

replies.body: i have exactly same unknown error

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for this one.  We want to review the situation further, and should be able to help you out directly.  See you there!
